title: Museum STEM Education Design Using Virtual Scientist-Based Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) concepts and museum exhibition interpretation methods
context.additional_context: Exploring ways to utilize museum STEM content considering workplace relevance for employees.

learning_goals: Using the virtual scientist application (Dr. Discovery), learners can analyze and explain STEM principles of museum exhibits with 80% accuracy.
Learners can create comprehensive evaluation reports on exhibits based on real-time data collected via mobile learning tools.
Propose at least two practical strategies for applying the effectiveness of STEM education in informal learning environments to corporate training programs.

resources: Mobile Application with Dr. Discovery-Like Features

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
